scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.docker:build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build && docker build -t local/growflow:test .
scripts.docker:run: docker run --rm -d --name growflow-test -p 8080:8080 -e NODE_ENV=development -e DB_PATH=/tmp/test.db local/growflow:test
scripts.docker:dev: docker run --rm -it --name growflow-dev -p 8080:8080 -e NODE_ENV=development -e DB_PATH=/tmp/dev.db -e MQTT_BROKER=localhost -e HA_URL=http://localhost:8123 local/growflow:test
scripts.test:addon: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run && sleep 5 && npm run docker:health
